question:

(1) Samuel (2) Randy

question:

(1) Kyle (2) Derrick

Question 2:Who was good and manipulating people?

question:
Donald was very grounded but Michael often got lost in their daydreams. _ was very capricious all the time.
(1) Donald (2) Michael
Question 1: What will Donald do if he was very grounded? Answer: If Donald is grounded, he works hard and does not like to fantasize.
Question 2: What will Michael do if he often got lost in their daydreams? Answer: If Michael often gets lost in his daydreams, he is unrealistic and egocentric.
Question 3: Who was very capricious all the time?
answer: Answer: If a person is capricious all the time means he does everything only according to his own ideas, he likely gets lost in their daydreams. Since Michael often does it, Michael is seen as very capricious all the time.

question:
After stopping when running, Betty was able to help Rachel treat their asthma because _ has it too.
(1) Betty (2) Rachel
Question 1: Why does Betty was able to help Rachel treat their asthma?
answer: Answer: If Betty was able to help Rachel treat asthma, she knows how to treat it. Since a person who has a mild disease may knows how to treat it, Betty may has asthma.

question:
Jeffrey was sick with the stomach flu and not hungry, but Christopher was starving. _ ordered food.
(1) Jeffrey (2) Christopher
Question 1: What will Jeffrey do if he was sick with the stomach flu and not hungry? Answer: Since Jeffrey was sick with the stomach flu and not hungry, he does not want to eat anything. In that case, he will not order food.
Question 2: What will Christopher do if he was starving?
answer: Answer: If Christopher is starve, he need to eat something next. If he needs food, he tends to order food.
